name: I asked for a skateboard for Christmas
name_original: I asked for a skateboard for Christmas
description:
A Bitsy Secret Santa gift for Gus, based on the prompts Skateboard, Hope, and Childhood! May the new year bring you new hobbies, fun things to look forward to, and all the joyous energy of a goofy skateboard kid.

Made with Bitsy by Adam Ledoux, with the help  of Bitsy Savior by Elkie, Borsky by ayolland, and these two hacks by Sean S. Leblanc. Special thanks to the infinitely friendly Bitscord Secret Santa Red Team, and to Chris and Neal for help with trick names. The font is 76London Fall, and any resemblances to the cover of a different video game are purely incidental.
